title: Cleaning Water One Stroke at a Time (University of California, Riverside)
text: ( Source : University of California, Riverside ) UC Riverside engineers are part of a team that won an international design competition for creating a swimsuit that cleans water as people swim By Sean Nealon on October 12 , 2015 RIVERSIDE,
